sentences: Arun Luthra is a saxophonist, konnakol artist, composer, and bandleader based in New York City.
Luthra was named the 2017-2018 composer-in-residence at Flushing Town Hall by Exploring the Metropolis.
In conjunction with this he was awarded a 2018 New Works Grant by the Queens Council on the Arts to premiere the music composed during his composer residency.
In 2021 Luthra was named the Interdisciplinary Artist-in-Residence at the University of Wisconsin-Madison's Division of the Arts.
Karl Wenninger's Wake Up Call, Wake Up Call (Bancroft)
